name: MAIN_BLOCK
code:
SELECT SINGLE * FROM t881 INTO @DATA(ls_t881) WHERE rldnr = '01'.
SELECT t881t~* FROM t881t INTO @DATA(ls_t881t) WHERE spras = sy-langu.
OPEN CURSOR lv_cursor FOR SELECT * FROM t882g WHERE bukrs = '1000'.
UPDATE t881 SET rldnr = '02' WHERE rldnr = '01'.
DELETE FROM t881t WHERE spras = 'EN'.
DATA(lv_dummy) = 'ABC'.
WRITE: / 'Hello World'.
